Package BackEnd

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionTile
    This class represents an Action Tile in the game.
    Coordinate
    This class is a coordinate class which will hold an integer coordinate pair X and Y for a particular object or item.
    FileReader
    This class is a file reader class which will take in a given level file format text file, verify it and create the gameboard, along with the fixed tiles in their correct locations, the players in their correct locations, and the amount and type of each floor/action tile that will populate the silk bag.
    FloorTile
    The FloorTile class will be the floor tiles of the Game board.
    Gameboard
    This class represents the Gameboard and all of its workings.
    GameLoad
    This class loads a game by reading the save file and running the inputs of the save file through the gameLogic to re-create the game.
    GameLogic
    Controls the flow of game, lets the UI know what choices the player has and the state of the game.
    GameSave
    This class records each players decisions.
    Leaderboard
    Holds information on the number of wins for one level.
    Player
    Stores details about the player while they are in-game, for example their inventory or player number.
    Profile
    Stores the data about a player's profile such as their name or scores across maps.
    Score
    Stores the wins/loss for one profile
    SilkBag
    This class represents the Silk bag that holds and distributes tiles for the game.
    Tile
    This represents an abstract class, tile to be put on the which represent tiles to be put on to the Gameboard.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Phase
    This enum class holds the phases that each player is in.
    Rotation
    This class stores the enum rotations of the floor tiles.
    TileType
    This enum class stores the different tile types that a tile might be.
